political_campaign.call_to_action: persuading voters, advertising, direct contact with voters
political_campaign.usecases: persuading voters to vote for a specific candidate, garnering critical votes of electors in the Electoral College
political_campaign.solutions: advertising, theme songs, stump speeches, negative campaigning, direct contact between voters and candidates
political_campaign.key_features: photographic techniques, statistical analysis, science of influence and affect

usecases: Presenting ideas and positions to voters
Reaching voters through traditional and new media
Delivering messages through public events and written materials
Establishing physical premises for campaign activities
campaigns.solutions: Providing equitable opportunities for contestants to convey their positions to citizens and compete for votes
key_features: Data on party and candidate operations
Allocation of public resources for campaigning
Information about media allocations and decision-making processes
Data on applications for rally permits

campaign_finance_and_lobbying_activities.solutions: Administers provisions of California's Political Reform Act, including detailed disclosure of the role of money in California politics
campaign_finance_and_lobbying_activities.key_features: Detailed disclosure of contributions and expenditures in connection with campaigns supporting or opposing state and local candidates and ballot measures, as well as the disclosure of expenditures made in connection with lobbying the State Legislature and attempting to influence administrative decisions of state government

electronic_filing_information.usecases: Electronic filing of campaign and lobbying documents
electronic_filing_information.solutions: Provides information and resources for electronic filing of campaign and lobbying documents
electronic_filing_information.key_features: Application for Password, Cal-Online Free Online Filing Forms, Approved Vendor Information

campaign_disclosure_and_requirements.solutions: Provides information and resources for campaign finance disclosure and requirements
campaign_disclosure_and_requirements.key_features: Campaign Forms and Instructions, Penalties for Late Filing

lobbying_disclosure_requirements.solutions: Provides information and resources for lobbying disclosure requirements
lobbying_disclosure_requirements.key_features: Ethics Training, Filing Deadlines, Required Documents for Registration, Amendment, Termination, and Withdrawal, Required Documents for Quarterly Disclosure Reports, Penalties for Late Filing

ocpf.us.product_name: Massachusetts Office of Campaign and Political Finance

criteria.User Interface: Easy to navigate and find relevant information
criteria.Information Availability: Provides information on filers, candidate and committee types, filing schedules, and participating banks
criteria.Accessibility: Accessible for filers to log in and organize with OCPF

criteria.Contribution Limits: Information on contribution limits and agency actions
criteria.Resources: Provides campaign finance law, public financing law, OCPF regulations, advisory opinions, interpretive bulletins, memoranda, and guidance letters

criteria.Candidate Reports: Provides reports for legislative races, statewide candidates, mayoral reports, etc.
criteria.Non-Candidate Filer Reports: Reports for PACs, ballot questions, local party reports, segregated funds, etc.
criteria.Independent Spending Reports: Reports for independent expenditure, electioneering communications, independent ballot question spending, etc.

Reports.call_to_action: Report Log, Candidate Reports, PAC Reports

criteria.Searchable Data: Provides searchable campaign finance data and election charts

Data.call_to_action: Searchable Campaign Finance Data, Download Data

criteria.Guides & Forms: Provides guides, forms, and publications for education

criteria.Information: Information about OCPF, director's message, career, and contact details

ocpf.us.call_to_action: Filer Listing, Filing Schedules, Searchable Database, Contribution Limits, Report Log, Candidate Reports, PAC Reports, Searchable Campaign Finance Data, Download Data, Guides, Forms & Publications, Support, Contact Us
ocpf.us.usecases: Campaign finance reporting, legal research, data analysis, educational resources
ocpf.us.solutions: Access to campaign finance information, legal resources, reports, and data for political campaign management
ocpf.us.key_features: Searchable database, contribution limits information, report log, candidate reports, downloadable data, educational resources, support

Commercial Database.usecases: Searching for business filings in Louisiana
Commercial Database.solutions: Access to commercial database for business filings in Louisiana
Commercial Database.key_features: Search functionality, access to business filing records

Commercial Online Filing.solutions: Convenient online platform for filing business documents
Commercial Online Filing.key_features: Online document submission, secure filing process

Election Qualifying.usecases: Qualifying for an election in Louisiana
Election Qualifying.solutions: Guidance and resources for election qualification process

Election Results.solutions: Provides election outcome data and analysis

Notary Public Database.solutions: Access to notary public database for verification
Notary Public Database.key_features: Notary search functionality, verification of notary status

Voter Lists.usecases: Acquiring voter lists for specific purposes
Voter Lists.solutions: Provides access to voter lists for authorized use
Voter Lists.key_features: List purchasing options, data security measures

Voter Registration.solutions: Guidance and resources for voter registration

Locate Historical Records.solutions: Provides access to historical archives and records
